question:
Last month you had a holiday overseas where you stayed with some friends. They have just sent you some photos of your holiday.
Write a letter to your friends. In your letter
•	Thank them for the photos and for the holiday
•	Explain why you didn’t write earlier
•	Invite them to come and stay with you
text: I hope you will find this letter in good health. I am extremely happy to receive the photos you send me last week. A big thank to all of you for capturing memorable moments and for making my stay a pleasant one.

After returning from the trip, I, as usual, got busy with my office workload and daily routine activities. A couple of times, I thought about writing a letter to all of you. But, I got engaged in a new assignment allocated to me by the management of our company. I hope you will understand my position. However, I would like to make a request to all of you kindly visit my home city Goa in the month of December after completion of your term exam. Moreover, a large international movie carnival is organized in the month of December which I personally believe that all of us will have lots of enjoyment. Therefore, I assume that all of you will make this trip possible. Nevertheless, please don’t worry about your stay as you all are going to accommodate at my house especially in my personal room.
Looking forward to hearing from you soon, in case of any new developments in this matter due to any reason feel free to contact me.
